You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesN N] > &ncy;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Ncy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/041d/index.htm U+0041D].
  * `&ncy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/043d/index.htm U+0043D].
